abstracts.cdata!:
The objective of the Fertilizer Industry
            Technical Assistance Project for Zambia is to improve
            Nitrogen Chemicals of Zambia Limited (NCZ's) production
            efficiency to import-competitive levels and to reduce the
            country's reliance on imported fertilizer. Negative
            impacts are air and water pollution; solid waste; Many other
            forms of solid waste have been found to be produced in the
            factory premises. These included scrap metal in various
            forms, used empty drums and rasher rings; loss of trees and
            plants; affects human health; and wastage of water.
            Mitigation measures includes: proper management of solid
            waste; wastewater management system; preparation of
            environmental management plan; and the water treatment plant
            is located for all the area.
